Screenwriter: William Hanna, Joseph Barbera, Deborah Kaplan, Harry Elfont, Jim Cash, Jack Epps Jr.
Production Co: Universal Pictures, Hanna-Barbera Productions, Amblin Entertainment
Sound Mix: Dolby Stereo, DTS, SDDS, Surround, Dolby Digital, Dolby SR
Synopsis: Fred Flintstone, the boy from the wrong side of the rocks, courts the beautiful, young heiress Wilma Slaghoople. Along with best friend Barney Rubble, and his future fiancee Betty, Fred and Wilma head off for a romantic weekend in Rock Vegas, the hottest rock resort on the continent.
Title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
